mapper.insert: insert into position(position_id,position_name,position_group_id,employer_id,create_time,update_time,position_description,responsibilities,requirements,salary) values(SEQ_POSITION.NEXTVAL,#{positionName},#{positionGroup.positionGroupId},(select employer_id from employer where username=#{employer.user.userName}),#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{positionDescription},#{responsibilities},#{requirements},#{salary})
mapper.select:
select p.POSITION_id,p.position_name,p.position_group_id,g.position_group_name,p.update_time, (select count(a.POSITION_ID) from application a where a.APPLICATION_STATUS=1 and a.POSITION_ID = p.POSITION_ID) as unreadapp_num, (select count(a.POSITION_ID) from application a where a.POSITION_ID = p.POSITION_ID) as allapp_num, e.employer_name from POSITION p, position_group g,employer e
p.position_group_id = g.position_group_id
and e.employer_id = (select employer_id from employer where username=#{userName})

SELECT p.POSITION_ID, p.POSITION_NAME, p.POSITION_DESCRIPTION, p.RESPONSIBILITIES, p.REQUIREMENTS, p.SALARY,g.position_group_id,g.position_group_name FROM POSITION p,position_group g WHERE POSITION_ID = #{positionId} and p.position_group_id=g.position_group_id

SELECT e.employer_name,p.POSITION_NAME, p.POSITION_DESCRIPTION, p.RESPONSIBILITIES, p.REQUIREMENTS, p.SALARY,g.position_group_name FROM POSITION p,position_group g,employer e WHERE p.position_group_id=g.position_group_id and e.employer_id=p.employer_id
